mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, title, filename1, filename2, filename3, filename4, filename5, filename6, filename7, filename8, content, revisionPolicy, refundPolicy, otherInformation) values(#{product_id}, #{title}, #{filename1}, #{filename2}, #{filename3}, #{filename4}, #{filename5}, #{filename6}, #{filename7}, #{filename8}, #{content}, #{revisionPolicy}, #{refundPolicy}, #{otherInformation})

insert into design_price_info ( product_price_id, b_pkg_description, s_pkg_description, p_pkg_description, b_original_image, s_original_image, p_original_image, b_commercial, s_Commercial, p_Commercial, b_sns_Kit, s_sns_Kit, p_sns_Kit, b_draft, s_draft, p_draft, b_revision, s_revision, p_revision, b_default_delivery, s_default_delivery, p_default_delivery, b_minimum_delivery, s_minimum_delivery, p_minimum_delivery, b_additional_price, s_additional_price, p_additional_price, b_price, s_price, p_price) values( #{product_id}, #{b_pkg_description}, #{s_pkg_description}, #{p_pkg_description}, #{b_original_image}, #{s_original_image}, #{p_original_image}, #{b_commercial}, #{s_Commercial}, #{p_Commercial}, #{b_sns_Kit}, #{s_sns_Kit}, #{p_sns_Kit}, #{b_draft}, #{s_draft}, #{p_draft}, #{b_revision}, #{s_revision}, #{p_revision}, #{b_default_delivery}, #{s_default_delivery}, #{p_default_delivery}, #{b_minimum_delivery}, #{s_minimum_delivery}, #{p_minimum_delivery}, #{b_additional_price}, #{s_additional_price}, #{p_additional_price}, #{b_price}, #{s_price}, #{p_price})
